title: Galactosyl BODIPY-based nanoparticles as a type-I photosensitizer for HepG2 cell targeted photodynamic therapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8735-8739
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00041B, Paper

Herein, we report galactosyl diiodo-BODIPY-based nanoparticles as a type-I photosensitizer (PS) with high water solubility for HepG2 cell targeted photodynamic therapy.
